topic: Should Muslim communities be expected to integrate their cultural practices into the mainstream society of their host countries while preserving their Islamic faith and traditions?

initial_response.English_Speaking: In my view, Muslim communities should strive to balance their commitment to their faith with an openness to the cultural practices of their host countries.
